title: Skladiště u banky
content:
Attached to radnice a Vivaldiho banka is skladiště. Skladiště connects with the clerical area on the second story of the administrative building which makes a convenient second entrance to either banka or radnice. It is one way that Geralt can get into the building when the bank is held up v Kapitola III.

Úkoly
Velká bankovní loupež
Zakázka: fleddeři (for ease of ingredient gathering)
